name: Falling Foreigner Objects
description:
The falling Foreigner Objects is one of the simple game which you have to dodge all the objects which are falling from the sky.

Try to survive by not allowing any object that is falling to be in contact with you because they can over injure you and eventually kill you.

The controls for dodging are quite simple and straight forward:

CONTROLS

- A or D allows you to run left or right.

- Double tap A or D to dash left or right.

-Esc allows you  to pause the game and resume.

NOTE: you can use LEFT or RIGHT arrows to the same actions as described above.
